title: Renesas reveals its first 32-bit RISC-V CPU
description: Renesas Electronics recently announced the release of its first 32-bit CPU core based on the RISC-V open-standard instruction set architecture (ISA). This development represents Renesas’ entry into the RISC-V based market. The new CPU core will be compatible with Renesas’ e2 studio IDE, in addition to supporting third-party IDEs tailored for RISC-V based MCUs, facilitating […]
